Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Sweet Lemon Boutique Bed & Breakfast in Cape Town (Sea Point), you'll be convenient to Milton Beach and Victoria and Alfred Waterfront. This family-friendly bed & breakfast is within close proximity of Sea Point Pavillion and Sea Point Swimming Pool.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 6 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and flat-screen televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and minibars, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. This bed & breakfast also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

With a stay at Sweet Lemon Boutique Bed & Breakfast in Cape Town (Sea Point), you'll be convenient to Milton Beach and Victoria and Alfred Waterfront. This family-friendly bed & breakfast is within close proximity of Sea Point Pavillion and Sea Point Swimming Pool.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Milton Beach - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Sea Point Pavillion - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Sea Point Swimming Pool - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Signal Hill - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Green Point Park - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Green Point Lighthouse - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Queens Beach - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Noon Day Gun - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Greenpoint Market - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Cape Town Stadium - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Metropolitan Golf Club - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Brundyn Gallery - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Bo Kaap Museum - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Auwal Mosque - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Cape Medical Museum - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi

The preferred airport for Sweet Lemon Boutique Bed & Breakfast is Cape Town (CPT-Cape Town Intl.) - 19.8 km / 12.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
